targets.rawSql: SELECT to_char(date_trunc('month', created_at), 'YY/MM') AS month_created, customer_id, count(*) FROM uploads WHERE multipart_upload_id IS NULL AND created_at >= '${__from:date:YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss}' AND created_at <= '${__to:date:YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss}' GROUP BY month_created, customer_id ORDER BY month_created, customer_id;

panels.title: Uploads per month per customer

targets.rawSql: SELECT to_char(date_trunc('month', created_at), 'YY/MM') AS month_created, customer_id, count(*) FROM jobs_result WHERE created_at >= '${__from:date:YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss}' AND created_at <= '${__to:date:YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss}' GROUP BY month_created, customer_id ORDER BY month_created, customer_id;

panels.title: Analyses per month per customer

panels.description: Customers are considered active in a given month if they ran at least 1 analysis. Deactivated customers are not removed from the inactive count.

targets.rawSql: select * from (select total_active_per_month.month as month, total_active, (sum(num_registrations) over(order by coalesce(total_active_per_month.month, total_registrations_per_month.month))) - total_active as total_inactive from ( select to_char(date_trunc('month', created_at), 'YY/MM') as month, count(*) as num_registrations from customers group by month order by month desc) total_registrations_per_month full outer join (select to_char(date_trunc('month', created_at), 'YY/MM') as month, count(distinct customer_id) as total_active from jobs_result group by month order by month) total_active_per_month ON total_registrations_per_month.month=total_active_per_month.month) result WHERE to_date(month, 'YY/MM') >= '${__from:date:YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss}' AND to_date(month, 'YY/MM') <= '${__to:date:YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss}';

panels.title: Monthly active vs. inactive customers (total)

panels.description: Customers are considered active in a given month if they ran at least 1 analysis. Deactivated customers are not removed from the inactive count.

targets.rawSql: select * from (select total_active_per_month.month as month, total_active, (sum(num_registrations) over(order by coalesce(total_active_per_month.month, total_registrations_per_month.month))) - total_active as total_inactive from ( select to_char(date_trunc('month', created_at), 'YY/MM') as month, count(*) as num_registrations from customers group by month order by month desc) total_registrations_per_month full outer join (select to_char(date_trunc('month', created_at), 'YY/MM') as month, count(distinct customer_id) as total_active from jobs_result group by month order by month) total_active_per_month ON total_registrations_per_month.month=total_active_per_month.month) result WHERE to_date(month, 'YY/MM') >= date_trunc('month', '${__from:date:YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss}'::date) AND to_date(month, 'YY/MM') <= date_trunc('month', '${__to:date:YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss}'::date);

panels.title: Monthly active vs. inactive customers (%)

panels.description: Customers are considered active in a given month if they ran at least 1 analysis.

targets.rawSql: select to_char(date_trunc('month', created_at), 'YY/MM') as month, count(*)::decimal / count(distinct customer_id) as analyses_per_active_customer from jobs_result where created_at >= '${__from:date:YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss}' AND created_at <= '${__to:date:YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss}' group by month order by month;

panels.title: Average analyses per monthly active customers

targets.rawSql: SELECT to_char(date_trunc('month', created_at), 'YY/"Q"Q') as quarter_created, customer_id, count(*) FROM uploads WHERE multipart_upload_id IS NULL AND created_at >= '${__from:date:YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss}' AND created_at <= '${__to:date:YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss}' GROUP BY quarter_created, customer_id ORDER BY quarter_created, customer_id;

panels.title: Uploads per quarter per customer

targets.rawSql: SELECT to_char(date_trunc('month', created_at), 'YY/"Q"Q') as quarter_created, customer_id, count(*) FROM jobs_result WHERE created_at >= '${__from:date:YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss}' AND created_at <= '${__to:date:YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss}' GROUP BY quarter_created, customer_id ORDER BY quarter_created, customer_id;

panels.title: Analyses per quarter per customer

panels.description: Customers are considered active in a given month if they ran at least 1 analysis. Deactivated customers are not removed from the inactive count.
panels.title: Quarterly active vs. inactive customers (total)

panels.description: Customers are considered active in a given month if they ran at least 1 analysis. Deactivated customers are not removed from the inactive count.
panels.title: Quarterly active vs. inactive customers (%)

panels.description: Customers are considered active in a given month if they ran at least 1 analysis.

targets.rawSql: select to_char(date_trunc('month', created_at), 'YY/"Q"Q') as quarter, count(*)::decimal / count(distinct customer_id) as analyses_per_active_customer from jobs_result where created_at >= '${__from:date:YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss}' AND created_at <= '${__to:date:YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss}' group by quarter order by quarter;

panels.title: Average analyses per quarterly active customers

targets.rawSql: SELECT count(*) as total_uploads from uploads WHERE multipart_upload_id IS NULL AND created_at >= '${__from:date:YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss}' AND created_at <= '${__to:date:YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss}'

panels.title: Total number of uploads

targets.rawSql: SELECT count(*) AS total_jobs FROM jobs_result WHERE created_at >= '${__from:date:YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss}' AND created_at <= '${__to:date:YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss}'

panels.title: Total number of jobs

targets.rawSql: SELECT count(*) AS total_uploads FROM uploads u JOIN customers c ON c.id=u.customer_id WHERE u.multipart_upload_id IS NULL AND c.email NOT LIKE '%curibio.com' AND u.created_at >= '${__from:date:YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss}' AND u.created_at <= '${__to:date:YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss}'

panels.title: Total number of uploads by non-Curi users

targets.rawSql: SELECT count(*) AS total_jobs FROM jobs_result j JOIN customers c ON c.id=j.customer_id WHERE c.email NOT LIKE '%curibio.com' AND j.created_at >= '${__from:date:YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss}' AND j.created_at <= '${__to:date:YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss}'

panels.title: Total number of jobs by non-Curi users

targets.rawSql: SELECT meta->'version' AS p3d_version, count(*) AS total_jobs FROM jobs_result WHERE created_at >= '${__from:date:YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss}' AND created_at <= '${__to:date:YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss}' GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY 1 DESC;

panels.title: Total number of jobs per Pulse3D version

targets.rawSql: SELECT type, count(*) AS total_uploads FROM uploads WHERE multipart_upload_id IS NULL AND created_at >= '${__from:date:YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss}' AND created_at <= '${__to:date:YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss}' GROUP BY 1;

panels.title: Total number of uploads per product type

targets.rawSql: SELECT type, AVG(extract(epoch FROM finished_at - created_at) / 60) AS avg_minutes FROM jobs_result WHERE created_at >= '${__from:date:YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss}' AND created_at <= '${__to:date:YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss}' GROUP BY type;

panels.title: Average Pulse3D Queue + Analysis Duration per Upload Type

targets.rawSql: SELECT queue, count(*) FROM jobs_queue GROUP BY queue;

panels.title: Current Pulse3D Queue Length by version

targets.rawSql: SELECT type, count(*) AS total_jobs FROM jobs_result WHERE created_at >= '${__from:date:YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss}' AND created_at <= '${__to:date:YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss}' GROUP BY 1;

panels.title: Total number of jobs per product type

targets.rawSql: SELECT type, AVG(extract(epoch FROM finished_at - started_at) / 60) AS avg_minutes FROM jobs_result WHERE created_at >= '${__from:date:YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss}' AND created_at <= '${__to:date:YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss}' GROUP BY type;

panels.title: Average Pulse3D Analysis Duration per Upload Type

targets.rawSql: SELECT j.customer_id, j.type, count(*) AS total_jobs FROM jobs_result j JOIN uploads u ON j.upload_id = u.id WHERE j.created_at >= '${__from:date:YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss}' AND j.created_at <= '${__to:date:YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss}' GROUP BY 1, 2 ORDER BY customer_id;

panels.title: Total number of jobs per product type per customer

targets.rawSql: SELECT customer_id, type, count(*) AS total_uploads FROM uploads WHERE multipart_upload_id IS NULL AND created_at >= '${__from:date:YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss}' AND created_at <= '${__to:date:YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss}' GROUP BY 1, 2 ORDER BY customer_id;

panels.title: Total number of uploads per product type per customer

targets.rawSql: SELECT j.customer_id, j.type, count(*) AS total_failures FROM jobs_result j JOIN uploads u ON j.upload_id = u.id WHERE j.meta->'error' IS NOT NULL AND j.created_at >= '${__from:date:YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss}' AND j.created_at <= '${__to:date:YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss}' GROUP BY 1, 2 ORDER BY customer_id;

panels.title: Total number of job failures per product type per customer

targets.rawSql: SELECT customer_id, upload_id, type, count(*) FROM jobs_result WHERE meta->'error' IS NOT NULL AND created_at >= '${__from:date:YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss}' AND created_at <= '${__to:date:YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss}' GROUP BY 1, 2, 3 ORDER BY 4 DESC;

panels.title: Total number of job failures per product type per upload
